name: (EXTREME WIP) Project Cynical
description:
NOTE: Press F11 to make it fullscreen!

Project Cynical is an extremely early in development and experimental isometric RPG. Help solve the inner conflict of the three main characters, The Character, his Conscience, and yourself. Bring them together or push them apart. Be good or be bad. This tabletop inspired RPG let's YOU make the decisions.

I hope you enjoy,

-ThiccestPenguin.

Contact me: ajtbecool@gmail.com
